Harold Collver

  1. Alternate Birth Name: Colver
  2. Foster Name: Shorty
  3. Foster Family: George Beehler
  4. Location of Family: Unknown
  5. Sending Organization: Children's Aid Society
  6. Arrival Place: Aurora, NE
  7. Age on Arrival: 9
  8. Date of Birth: 1907-12-16, New York City, NY
  9. Date of Death: 1985-12-21, Shoshoni, WY
  10. Gender: male
  11. Source: OTR, 556, 566; Hamilton County Register, 22 June 1917; Archives Database
